website_summaries.verdict: The JLab Flex is a powerful, affordable headphone pair aimed at DJs and musicians on a budget.
pros: Powerful audio performance with solid bass response and crisp highs
cons: Cable is shorter than most DJs and musicians will likely want, and doesn't lock into place

customer_reviews.title: received a used instead of new pair
customer_reviews.text: Ordered new and got an obviously previously used pair. They looked new but had fingerprints and even a hair tangled by one of the ear pieces. They work fine so I’m not going to go through the hassle of a return but maybe buy from somewhere else if you want them new.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: the sound was very good. However
customer_reviews.text: When I pugged the headphones into an audio device, the sound was very good. However, there wasn't an indicator light to show if the power was on or off, but there was an indicator light to show if the noise cancellation was on or off. Upon inserting the charging plug into the power connector, the power connector slipped back into the headset and disconnected from the power plug. I had only taken the headset out of the box only 15 minutes earlier after receiving it. Thus, I returned the headset for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald Pearson

customer_reviews.title: DECENT HEADPHONES. BUT BASS SPEAKERS ARE WARBLING SOME AND DISTORTING WHEN VOLUME IS RAISED.
customer_reviews.text: DECENT HEADPHONES. VERY NICE BUILD QUALITY AND NICE AUDIO CABLE. BUT SOUND STAGE IS LEFT TO BE DESIRED AND HOLLOW SOUNDING - NOT VERY DYNAMIC. BASS SPEAKERS ARE WARBLING SOME AND DISTORTING WHEN VOLUME IS RAISED.
customer_reviews.author: MARK P.

customer_reviews.title: Just wished it was a bit louder.
customer_reviews.text: Great headset, loud once its cranked up, feels good on walks, cant really complain beside l want them a bit louder. I have had JLab Epic 2 for about almost 2 years and they are the loudest blutooth bud lve ever had ever. Without lossing it sound quality. These feel and sound just as good but not as loud as the Epic 2s.
customer_reviews.author: Yolanda Lockette

customer_reviews.title: Keeper
customer_reviews.text: Work great. Sound fine and fold up. Just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Edvar

customer_reviews.title: they would be good for 50$ but not for 100
customer_reviews.text: when I ordered these I was excited to try them out, I was surprised to find that not only did they not cancel much noise, but the plastic in them is cheap and brittle, already 3 weeks after purchase and the covers are cracked. this could of been a great pair of headphones if they used good build materials. it looks like they cheaped out on these, sad to see.
customer_reviews.author: fire

customer_reviews.title: CHEAPLY MADE, CHEAP MATERIALS, WONT LEAST EVEN 6 MONTHS
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THIS PIECE OF GARBAGE! Ok, it is cheap for the type of product and it offers a good sound, but it won't last even 6 months!! It is cheaply made with cheap materials and glue. Mine was ok just for a month, then the BT didn't work, so I keep using it wired, but now the earpiece just came off because of the cheap glue they use. I emailed them to makeuse of the "1 year" warranty but It was not great because i live in Lima, Peru, and sent it to the US would cost me like 40 USD, what a waste of money! Won't even think about buying other JLab product.
customer_reviews.author: Rafael Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Better than Bose
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to drown out my Mother screaming. She only has one volume wich is super loud. They work great very durable because I also use them to drown out my husband snoring and they are so much cheaper then Bose! JLab has yet to fail me.
customer_reviews.author: Angela R. Acton-Nehl

customer_reviews.title: Conforme à la description du vendeur. Transport rapide. ...
customer_reviews.text: Conforme à la description du vendeur. Transport rapide. Très bon sons claire. Qualité supérieur. Micro intégré. Pour écouter de la musique ou parler avec votre smartphone. Un peu couteux avec le taux de change.
customer_reviews.author: macktool

customer_reviews.title: No Mic when wired.
customer_reviews.text: Meh sound quality and the mic doesn't work when wired. I would have returned immediately if i knew that.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: They are beautifully constructed and fit very well
customer_reviews.text: I found these to be totally lacking in bass. This was odd as the specs list them down to 20 hz, a very low end. They are beautifully constructed and fit very well. The main reason I purchased them in fact, was for their ear cup size. However, due to the sound, I returned them.
customer_reviews.author: NRD

customer_reviews.title: Right side has no sound and even though the headphones ...
customer_reviews.text: Right side has no sound and even though the headphones have titanium the adjustments are made of plastic and broke after a few months. The two stars are for the audio quality and shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Grover

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Had to return them as the odor from the rubber was intense.
customer_reviews.author: James Hornstein

customer_reviews.title: excellent headphones!
customer_reviews.text: (Update) the headphone port no longer works and no sound is coming out. No update on warranty either. I ordered the wrong pair thinking these had bluetooth based on a link but it isnt a problem with me. I love them so far! though they are rather loud and at times you can hear them so i keep them at a low volume. You can practically use them as portable speakers when turned up all the way. The design is rather nice and comfortable. The option that they fold up is simply awesome! Ill have to see how these do when working out next.
customer_reviews.author: tony

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are comfortable and sound great. Travel a lot, the only issue I had was with audio cord JLab replaced with a flat and more durable cord. Thanks JLAB!
customer_reviews.author: A. "Bo" Bojorquez

customer_reviews.title: with good frequency response for classical music
customer_reviews.text: Headphones work very well, with good frequency response for classical music, and the ear cups are comfortable for long periods (1-4 hours). They fold nicely and come in a durable case. They also isolate sound nicely and serve well when I'm flying both as headphones and ear muffs for sleeping.
customer_reviews.author: John VR

customer_reviews.title: While the headphone have a great design, if I knew that they noise canceling ...
customer_reviews.text: While the headphone have a great design, if I knew that they noise canceling only blocks a minimal quiet noise, I would have bought another headphone from either a different brand that offers better sound quality and sound cancelation. It provides a decent average sound quality, with subpar bass.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as comfortable as I had hoped and disappointing sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Not as comfortable as I had hoped and disappointing sound quality, somewhat muddy. Unfortunately, I decided to return at 32 days rather than 30, so I am out of luck.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Jlab audio wins!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these !! The sound , the fit and there bluetooth nice job.
customer_reviews.author: kenneth jones

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones. Great sound and no complaints when I ...
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones. Great sound and no complaints when I talk to people on them either.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Deus

customer_reviews.title: Nice headphones.
customer_reviews.text: They are very nice a decent balance of bass and midrange, one is not overpowering the other, they are real comfortable over the ear headphones. Great work guys!
customer_reviews.author: DDOLLAR56

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: It does not work on my Windows 7 Laptop. I get a error "Missing Driver".
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Not a good bye. It's sitting on my coffee table useless
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't worth the price! The headset is quite heavy, its highs, lows, and bass sounds very average. Noise cancellation is okay. The headphone loses connection from one room to the next. Not a good bye. It's sitting on my coffee table useless.
customer_reviews.author: Lev

customer_reviews.title: The quality to connect to the phone is purdy good, it did do that well
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to use at my work and for the BLUETOOTH option. These head phones do not play through the laptop? They connect but no sound. There are no drivers to assist in connecting to the laptops at work. The website has no driver specs to look for on the internet. They do play with the cord though and defeats the purpose of wireless. The quality to connect to the phone is purdy good, it did do that well. I do wish it would work on computers.
customer_reviews.author: Thibodaux

customer_reviews.title: Good buy Working for me
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are what you pay for and a little bit more. They come with a great case and mic with button input for calls and music control which both work for my note five and apple iPod. I bought these to start streaming on twitch.tv and there a perfect starter pair not to expensive but they do the job well enough for me to hear everything I need to while I stream. I would recommend these to any one who wants good bass headphones that still sound good and don't break the bank. The build seems solid metal band across the top with comfortable cushions. I am very happy with this buy
customer_reviews.author: Montrell M.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The Jlab omni bluetooth headphones are a much better pair.
customer_reviews.author: marlon Almarales

customer_reviews.title: MOST COMFORTABLE HEADPHONES I HAVE EVER OWNED!
customer_reviews.text: FREAKING AWESOME! I love everything about them. From the amazing fit to the crystal clear sound. I mainly use them for audio books, but the music I have listened to is great! AND...I love how the unique shape and the cushy ear pads don't pinch my ears.
customer_reviews.author: d.e.matthews

customer_reviews.title: The sound is great, very well balanced sound with nice tight bass ...
customer_reviews.text: I was very lucky to purchase these JLAB Flex Studio headphones for $49.99 during the ONE DAY FLASH SALE. I own other JLAB products so I was on their email list when the FLASH sale happened, and I immediately bought a pair that morning of the sale. PROS: The sound is great, very well balanced sound with nice tight bass when using the line connection from headphone set to music source. CONS: Like all Blue Tooth connections you lose some fidelity, the sound is a little flat. Bottomline, I Lov these headphones. I would do it again, it was a steal at the FLASH SALE price !!!! Thanks JLAB
customer_reviews.author: Adventure

customer_reviews.title: Nice sound, not so attractive.
customer_reviews.text: First, let me say I love the audio quality of jlab products. There's a lot of leakage even at low to moderate volumes, but the sound is amazing. Two things I've come to hate though is how bulky and square the earcups are. I also started to hate how the height adjusting sliders are on the top of the headphone band. Those two things didn't bother me at first, but I've come to hate the way it looks in person. I'll keep them for the sound though until I get a new set of headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Cj

customer_reviews.title: A Sound decision you won't be sorry with
customer_reviews.text: This headphone is extremely comfortable and has performance equal to competitors priced four times higher. JLab is my choice for earbuds and is now my choice for headphones!
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: They are extremely comfortable and at the same time substantially built
customer_reviews.text: JLAB impresses again, the Flex Studio are a real treat. They are extremely comfortable and at the same time substantially built. When initially trying them the first thing I was impressed with was the level of noise canceling. Without music playing it was as if I was under water (while standing in a loud wharehouse). The sound is absolutely superb, I used the JLab burn in tool and I have to say WOW! Well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Unknown

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I have to say that I have bought a few headsets from Jlab audio and I have always been satisfied. I have no complaints whatsoever. They have an amazing customer service. And they aim to please. I hope this company never changes from being as good as they are .
customer_reviews.author: Alrick

customer_reviews.title: I thought the sound was poor and "muddied" as others have stated
customer_reviews.text: For those who are critiquing the sound - please read the instructions carefully. When I first got these, I thought the sound was poor and "muddied" as others have stated. But, JLab clearly states you need to break these in with many hours of continuous playing before the audio reaches peak performance. Once I did that, the sound was fantastic and frankly, my Bose headphones have been put in the drawer. The "break-in" period is absolutely critical!
customer_reviews.author: Shana

customer_reviews.title: Jlab Omni vs Jlab FLEX
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are light and comfortable. They are not loud like the Jlab OMNi. They also dont have bass like the Jlab OMNi. The bass of these headphones seems more like treble, If I where you I would pick the Jlab OMNi over these if you dont get these you not really missing out trust me. The only thing thats good about these headphones compared to the OMNi headphones is that the FLEX is more comfortable and light weight.
customer_reviews.author: telling the truth

customer_reviews.title: These JLab headphones are great! If you follow them on Twitter they sent ...
customer_reviews.text: These JLab headphones are great! If you follow them on Twitter they sent out a code which dropped the price to $50 which is a fantastic value for these. Tried them out - I'm no expert, but I thought the sound was clear and crisp and they block out background noises. I highly recommend these headphones
customer_reviews.author: Cb

customer_reviews.title: Not so good.
customer_reviews.text: Sound is fine. Comfort is good. But one of the Ear pieces started to break off only after 1 month of use. Now the Plastic is completely breaking away. Time to look for new ones.
customer_reviews.author: GreyMetal

customer_reviews.title: THA BEST
customer_reviews.text: Starting off, I have used beats studios before and these blow those out of the water. The fact that the Flex for jlab are half the price makes me ask why would anyone pay twice the money for a product that rivals the Flex. These headphones are EXTREMELY comfortable and sound wonderful. Great buy. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Casanova N

customer_reviews.title: Decent build, so-so audio quality with NC enabled
customer_reviews.text: While the headphones are sturdy compared to the competition, there is a substantial difference in sound quality with NC enabled. And not for the better. I’m guessing the patents by Bose prevents a lot of companies from coming up with a good NC algorithm.
customer_reviews.author: Rajiv Murthy

customer_reviews.title: They are durable and the sound is bar none as I've owned some of the best. I'm looking to buy the blue tooth version ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the exact same set but the wired version. They are durable and the sound is bar none as I've owned some of the best. I'm looking to buy the blue tooth version as my fiance who went from the crappy ear plug style and was against these now won't give them up after using them. So the quality in both sound and materials is top notch. I'm going to order the Bluetooth version to up the anty till she steals those lol
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: As a disabled guy who uses forearm crutches, bluetooth is practically a necessity when moving around outside. I love how these fit (assuming of course that the various size cushions were tried out).
customer_reviews.author: Erik Lee

customer_reviews.title: FABULOUS PHONES!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these headphones!! So glad I bought them. I used them on a 5 hour flight last week- both ways. Only listened to my movie and book- not the kids (and there were multiple) crying/yelling on the plane. I have bought many headphones and earbuds, etc- and these are my favorite. I also love the case so I don't have to worry about them getting messed up!
customer_reviews.author: Cristina M.Y. Pitzer

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth is for me
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product. Just a little better instructions on pairing would be appreciated. Very comfortable, clear sound. Hope to try them while cutting the grass on my riding mower.
customer_reviews.author: DON1239

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: I only had it for a few days now, but so far they great headphones. Can't beat the sale price for what I got them for. I use for video editing on my laptop and works great. Finally can get my work while my wife watches tv. Noise canceling works great. Also use for my nintendo switch. Love that they wrap around the ears for comfort. Great sound to. Very solid feel martial used. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Eddie

customer_reviews.title: Good product lacking in the quality Department
customer_reviews.text: Very good looking headphones ....very good sounding headphones ....so very good product ...but not the best for the price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great sound, bluetooth is clean and dropless in my house.
customer_reviews.author: tom_mayo

customer_reviews.title: Best Value Active Noise Cancelling Wireless Headphones
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about these headphones. I can wear them on a cross country flight without ear fatigue. They are the best value around.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good sound for what they are. Ear cups are flimsy. Had to glue them back on.
customer_reviews.author: C. D. Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great sound fit quality and for the price get 2.
customer_reviews.author: **Da-Roc**

customer_reviews.title: Love these earphones!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best value for the money...and work well if you have bigger ears like me!
customer_reviews.author: V.A.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome nc and very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Really like these headphones. Fit well and are not uncomfortable when wearing for long periods of time. NC is great. Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Among the best I've ever tried. Cushions around my ears ever so comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Dane

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not worth 150 the most I would pay is 75
customer_reviews.author: Jahaziel X Soto

customer_reviews.title: A great product. I am so happy I purchased these
customer_reviews.text: A great product. I am so happy I purchased these.
customer_reviews.author: HRP

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing. So easy to blue tooth and great sound!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Crawford

customer_reviews.title: JLAB Flex
customer_reviews.text: Sound – excellent!! Could use a little more bass but overall the quality is incredible. Comfort – the most comfortable headphones. I use these for hours during my studies for school or on the beach before a heat and they don't get uncomfortable at all which is a first. Features – I love the folding feature. For as much as I travel this is essential. I am not a huge fan of the metal because it gets scratched easily but the memory foam is awesome. Overall- these are unbeatable. Go look at beats or any of the other top name products and you cannot get this quality for this price! Excellent!
customer_reviews.author: Karen D.

customer_reviews.title: Love the new Flex headphones
customer_reviews.text: Love the new Flex headphones. I use them casually during the day, during weights, in flight, and at home. They have a great sleek look and love how they fold to a compact form. Sounds quality works great and a great price value for the product.
customer_reviews.author: @irongirlnadia

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME HEADPHONES ... AWESOME DEAL
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are very comfortable, and for the price, I could not pass them up! Jlab sent me a link to Amazon where the price went from $149.99 to $49.50! The ANC works as advertised; reducing the ambient noise quite dramatically. And the sound quality will blow you away; crisp; clear; clarity; through all ranges. Jlab has done it again; quality product at a reasonable price (even without the discount, worth $150).
customer_reviews.author: Danco1830

product_meta.title: JLab Audio Flex Studio DJ Style Headphones with Metal Build, Guaranteed for Life, Carrying case and Folding for Easy Travel.
product_meta.description: Style:FLEX-Universal MicFrom the studio to the club, JLab Audio Flex Headphones bridge the gap between DJ club-mixing and studio-producing headphones. With ergonomic Form-Fit™ Ear cups and a Stainless Steel Metal backbone, not to mention audiophile-loving, award-winning sound, Flex Headphones are the go-to for any music lover, or bold city-goer.
feature_bullets: Stainless Steel Headband with Plush Memory Foam Cushion
Cloud Foam Ear cups with Eco Leather
Detachable Universal Mic with Track Control with Flat Tangle Free Cable

JLab's award-winning sound, C3 (Crystal Clear Clarity) technology delivers a clean, crisp, immersive sound with vibrant highs, midst and drop it like it's hot bass through pristine high performance neodymium backed 40 millimeter drivers.

Fully embracing, ergonomically shaped ear cups swivel 100 degree to provide optimum listening options: Spin tracks in one ear and listen to vibe of the crowd in the other. Plus the ear cups tilt 20 degree for a Cush, customized fit for long-term studio use.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.2 out of 5 stars80 ratings3.2 out of 5 stars
